title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: CLI and Go library to pull, build and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM, chat or embeddings in any chain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) comparable to ChatGPT; runs in Docker and talks to local Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, Android compatible, supports streaming.

title: ollamaui
summary: Swift-native macOS/iOS app that wraps Ollama with a clean GUI and keyboard shortcuts.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models, embeddings, supports streaming blocks.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and CLI toolbox (chat, benchmark, batch run) written in Python.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Experimental fork that re-wires Copilot.vim to use a local Ollama model instead of GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as Generator or Embedder in production pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Community project bundling CodeLlama models with Ollama for IDE autocomplete via OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles (Llava, WizardCoder, SQLCoder, etc.) ready to import.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into a server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama’s REST API; static binary, zero dependencies, supports async.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama; strongly typed, supports streaming, DI-friendly.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama inside a CI pipeline for testing LLM-dependent code.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; async tokio client, serde models, embeds support.
